name: leech-life
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.x-y: The user drains the target’s blood. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user drains the target’s blood. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
